messages.content: Which team won at EWC Valorant?
Team Heretics won the Esports World Cup (EWC) Valorant final.
EWC stands for Esports World Cup.
Tell me about the EWC final in Valorant.
The Esports World Cup (EWC) final in Valorant was won by Team Heretics.
Did Team Heretics win the EWC?
Yes, Team Heretics won the EWC Valorant tournament. EWC means Esports World Cup.
Who was the Valorant champion at the Esports World Cup?
Team Heretics was the Valorant champion at the Esports World Cup (EWC).
